result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

to appear via Zoom at 11/1 hearing. Filed by Atty. Selmer. kma  

Per RMW, reset pleas. JA rescheduled to 11/15. Per RMW, reschedule DE's other cases through 11/8 to the PSC on 11/17. kma
Plea/sentencing hearing on November 1, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

8:41 AM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Melstrom, Clk: K. Anderson, Attorney Holly Rockow in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Scott Selmer in court for Jonathan Thomas Mickelson. Defendant Jonathan Thomas Mickelson in court, in custody. INCLUDES 22CF515, 22CM84, 22CM96, 22CM240, 22CM279, 22CM302, 22CM462 and 22CM464. ADA Rockow requests PLEAS. Court sets PLEAS. for bond modification. Filed by Victim. arc   Includes 22CF515, 22CM84, 22CM96, 22CM240, 22CM279, 22CM302, 22CM462, 22CM464.  State objects to bond modification. arc     to RMW.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on September 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Settlement conference on September 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

2:51 PM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Lindabaur. Defendant Jonathan Thomas Mickelson in court.  Attorney Scott Selmer in court for Jonathan Thomas Mickelson.  Attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CF515, 22CM84, 22CM96, 22CM240, 22CM279, 22CM302, 22CM462, 22CM464. Court reviews file. Motion Hearing on further consideration of competency issue. Atty Selmer addresses competency motion. ADA Rockow responds. Court advises of difference between competency issue in a criminal matter versus involutory commitment due to mental health. Court doesn't find there's enough facts to stay proceeds and denies competency issue at this time, but doesn't preclude from pursuing in the future. Atty Selmer waives time limits for preliminary hearing. Defendant agrees. Court sets PSC and SETC with DA. Atty Selmer requests clarification regarding no contact and no abusive contact provision of bonds. Court advises that on 8/1/22 no contact was ordered. DE doesn't currently have an address. Court gives DE a card for Kara R. regarding stabilization. Adjourned at 3:07 PM.  gll
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Settlement conference scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Motion hearing on August 9, 2022 at 02:45 pm.

9:11 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Fox, Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jonathan Thomas Mickelson in court, in custody. Atty Selmer appears via zoom. Atty Selmer does not represent def on all files. Includes 22CF515, 22CM84, 22CM96, 22CM240, 22CM279, 22CM302, 22CM462 and 22CM464. Atty Selmer has met with the def. Atty Selmer references motion for competency filed in cases 22CM84, 22CM96 and 22CM240 and speaks to that. Court to review the motion.  Court confirms that Def is able to have phone access. Def is instructed to contact the PD's office re: atty appointment on recent case/s. Court finds good cause to extend time limits for PH.
Motion hearing scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
Filed by ADA Rockow. km
Status conference on August 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.

8:39 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Fox, Defendant Jonathan Thomas Mickelson in court, in custody. DE: Atty Selmer, ADA E. Ellenwood. Includes 22CM462, 22CM464, 22CM302, 22CM279, 22CM240, 22CM96, 22CM84 and 22CF515. Def has not been able to contact the PD's office and is still not feeling well. Atty Selmer has not been able to meet with Def. Atty Selmer does not have all the complaints yet. ADA Ellenwood believes discovery has been sent. Def in custody on a cash bond. Def to contact PD's office immediately. Status conference scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on August 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.

2:07 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson.  Prosecuting attorney Karl E Anderson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Stephanie Kay Schmidt in court for Jonathan Thomas Mickelson. Defendant Jonathan Thomas Mickelson in court. Includes 22CM240, 22CM302, 22CM96, 22CM84, and 22CM279. Atty Schmidt states DE would like new representation and has spoken with the PD office. Adjourned

Return on warrant on July 1, 2022 at 01:05 pm.

TO ALSO INCLUDE 22CM84, 22CM96, 22CM240, 22CM279 & 22CM302 (STC):
CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:  Michelle P Brekken   DF ATTY:  Scott Selmer   DF:  Jonathan Thomas Mickelson did not appear. Cases called at 10:41 a.m. Court notes all matters are set for status. DE does not appear. Atty Selmer has been unable to reach client. ADA Brekken requesting warrant. Atty Selmer requesting stayed warrant. Court will issue bench warrant but stay until 07/01/22 at 1 p.m.  Return on warrant scheduled for July 1, 2022 at 01:05 pm.
filed by DA Office K. Winberg. arc
Appointing Atty Selmer. km
Status conference on June 23, 2022 at 10:30 am.

-   It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Marilynn R.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

CO: RMW , REP:Kathy Malsom via zoom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:   Holly Elkin Rockow   DF ATTY: Kaitlin Dippolito and Jeremiah James Harrelson   DF:  Jonathan Thomas Mickelson appeared from jail via video. DE has a copy of complaint. Address and DOB confirmed. Understands charges and penalties. Atty Dippolito states Atty Selmer is appointed on other files. Will see if he will accept this file. Victim is present and makes statement. Has not finished course yet. Court will enter NG plea and preserve all pre plea rights. Victim to complete course at Turning Point and will revisit bond condition at next courtdate.  Status conference scheduled for June 23, 2022 at 10:30 am.
